name: Yoshida Particle Simulation Results App
description:
The Hands-on Portal Digital Dashboard Yoshida Particle Simulation Application Webble

Old Hands-on Portal application using the old version of the DigitalDashboard.

This Webble app loads a few DigitalDashboard components, connects them, and loads some data. Sets up a visualization environment that can show the results from a particle simulation of the universe.
author: legacyDigitalDashboard
